New Records: Axar Patel scored 65 runs off 31 balls with a high score of 6x6.
Shivam Mavi scored 26 runs off 15 balls.
Dasun Shanaka contributed with 56 not out and took 2 wickets.
Sri Lanka scored 206 runs in 20 overs.
Key Match Events: Closely contested match with key moments in batting and bowling performances.
Notable individual contributions from players on both sides.
Pre-Game Insights: India elected to field first after winning the toss.
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka won the match by 16 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rahul Tripathi made his T20I debut.
